name: Illa d'Or Club Apartamentos

reviews.text: Spent 8 nights in a studio apartment.
reviews.title: An Oasis

reviews.text: The only downside - being on the grand floor and adjacent to the entrance, we were "on view" whilst sitting on our balcony.
reviews.title: 4th time and just as lovely

reviews.text: Otherwise, a lovely clean complex that gave us everything we wanted. The use of the adjacent Hotel facilities is a great bonus; the bar staff on the pinewalk provide a great service at fair prices.
reviews.title: Clean, friendly and well located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pinewalk location is in our view the best in Puerto Pollensa.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Back for another lovely week at the Illa Dor apartments, it didn't let us down. We had requested an apartment on the top floor unfortunately, this didn't happen, but we were pleased as we stayed in room 716, which was bigger and just lovely. Staff at the hotel are very helpful and friendly. It's not cheap, but if you want quality and a lovely place to stay then you really won't go wrong.....
reviews.title: Good clean apartments

aka: Illa D'Or Club Apartamentos Majorca/Port De Pollenca, Spain
description: Situated in one of the most attractive coastal localities in the northern part of the island, these apartments are a mere 50 metres from the beach in the most exclusive residential area of Port de Pollença, opposite the emblematic Hotel Illa d’Or. Originally opened in the late 80s, the apartments have recently undergone comprehensive renovations, completed in April 2009. A modern design concept and the one-of-a-kind Illa d’Or service make the Club Apartments the best in their class.
